title: Norwegian Cozy
resume: After a bad relationship breakup, Georg moves back in with his father Frank. Georg's biggest wish is to become a father himself, and his biggest fear is to become an intolerable paranoiac like his father. While still sane, Georg starts to write letters to his future son as he continues to search for a worthwhile mother for him.
